name: Hall of Fame Resort & Entertainment Company
description: Hall of Fame Resort & Entertainment Company (HOFV) is a premier destination and entertainment company focused on the sports and entertainment sectors. Established in 2019 and based in Canton, Ohio, the company is dedicated to creating a unique experience for fans and guests through innovative offerings and world-class facilities. HOFV operates the Hall of Fame Village, a multi-use development that includes the Pro Football Hall of Fame, hotels, dining, and various entertainment options. The company's mission is to honor the legends of the game while also providing engaging experiences for fans of all ages. HOFV is committed to leveraging its unique assets to drive economic growth in the community and enhance the sports tourism industry. In addition to its focus on football, HOFV aims to expand its offerings to include a diverse range of sports and entertainment experiences, including concerts, events, and conferences. The company is also involved in partnerships and initiatives that promote youth sports and community involvement, reflecting its commitment to social responsibility and community engagement.

faq.answer: HOFV is headquartered in Canton, Ohio, USA.

faq.answer: HOFV's main attractions include the Pro Football Hall of Fame, hotels, dining options, and entertainment events.

faq.answer: Michael Crawford is the CEO of Hall of Fame Resort & Entertainment Company.
